existing_features.title: Update the frontend movie grid pagination UI to include clickable numbered page controls so users can directly jump to a specific page (while keeping existing Back/Next controls).
Add a React Query hook to fetch the new backend pagination metadata and wire it into MovieGrid so the numbered pagination reflects the real total pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add page number pagination controls so users can select which page to switch to
Add a backend query that returns pagination metadata for the movie list so the frontend can render numbered page controls (at minimum: totalPages for the current ITEMS_PER_PAGE).

projectName: Add numbered pagination controls to movie grid
